translation.en: I'm making the Pit of Doom.
translation.vi: I'm making the Pit of Doom.

translation.en: Wanna help make the Pit of Doom?
translation.vi: Wanna help make the Pit of Doom?

translation.en: We don't because they're yucky and mucky and icky, icky, icky.
translation.vi: We don't because they're yucky and mucky and icky, icky, icky.

translation.en: [Charlotte] I have to take the girls shopping later. Wanna come?
translation.vi: [Charlotte] I have to take the girls shopping later. Wanna come?

translation.en: Hey, Dad, Leo and me are going to finish the Pit of Doom today.
translation.vi: Hey, Dad, Leo and me are going to finish the Pit of Doom today.

translation.en: Come on, Nancy. Show us how it's done.
translation.vi: Come on, Nancy. Show us how it's done.

translation.en: [David singing] ♪ Whispering in my ear… ♪
translation.vi: [David singing] ♪ Whispering in my ear… ♪

translation.en: You and I are taking Nancy shopping in a bit for school clothes.
translation.vi: You and I are taking Nancy shopping in a bit for school clothes.

translation.en: One thing I do know about Bean is she has no imagination.
translation.vi: One thing I do know about Bean is she has no imagination.

translation.en: At first, I thought it was Leo with a bad cold,
translation.vi: At first, I thought it was Leo with a bad cold,

translation.en: That's not gonna happen, Bean.
translation.vi: That's not gonna happen, Bean.

translation.en: Isn't that right, Dottsy? [chuckles]
translation.vi: Isn't that right, Dottsy? [chuckles]

translation.en: [whimpers] Sorry. Sorry. Sorry.
translation.vi: [whimpers] Sorry. Sorry. Sorry.

translation.en: You! You! You!
translation.vi: You! You! You!

translation.en: [Mrs. Trantz] Ow, ow, ow! Don't trip.
translation.vi: [Mrs. Trantz] Ow, ow, ow! Don't trip.

translation.en: Why do you think Ivy's boring?
translation.vi: Why do you think Ivy's boring?

translation.en: Nothing. Nothing. Nothing.
translation.vi: Nothing. Nothing. Nothing.

translation.en: Calling someone a tightwad is rude, Bean.
translation.vi: Calling someone a tightwad is rude, Bean.

translation.en: Apologize to Nancy, please.
translation.vi: Apologize to Nancy, please.

translation.en: [Bean] Come on, Nancy.
translation.vi: [Bean] Come on, Nancy.

translation.en: [Nancy] Very funny, Bean.
translation.vi: [Nancy] Very funny, Bean.

translation.en: I am the ghost of Mr. Killop.
translation.vi: I am the ghost of Mr. Killop.

translation.en: Get out of there, Bean.
translation.vi: Get out of there, Bean.

translation.en: -[Charlotte] What? What? What? -[gasps]
translation.vi: -[Charlotte] What? What? What? -[gasps]

translation.en: -[Ivy] Persephone, say hello to Bean. -[Persephone] Bonjour, Bean.
translation.vi: -[Ivy] Persephone, say hello to Bean. -[Persephone] Bonjour, Bean.

translation.en: It's my spell book.
translation.vi: It's my spell book.

translation.en: Let's do the spell on Nancy.
translation.vi: Let's do the spell on Nancy.

translation.en: -♪ It's optimal ♪ -♪ We're good ♪
translation.vi: -♪ It's optimal ♪ -♪ We're good ♪

translation.en: -♪ No kids, no babies ♪ -♪ I know, baby ♪
translation.vi: -♪ No kids, no babies ♪ -♪ I know, baby ♪

translation.en: Stop running away this minute, Bean!
translation.vi: Stop running away this minute, Bean!

translation.en: [sighs] Yup! Hi! I'm Bean.
translation.vi: [sighs] Yup! Hi! I'm Bean.

translation.en: to the Pit of Doom undetected.
translation.vi: to the Pit of Doom undetected.

translation.en: This is Poopy Yard.
translation.vi: This is Poopy Yard.

translation.en: [Ivy] Stay with me, Bean. Stay with me.
translation.vi: [Ivy] Stay with me, Bean. Stay with me.

translation.en: This is Ivy, by the way.
translation.vi: This is Ivy, by the way.

translation.en: I just saw worms here. This is a worm place. [groans]
translation.vi: I just saw worms here. This is a worm place. [groans]

translation.en: [in unison] The most dangerous kind!
translation.vi: [in unison] The most dangerous kind!

translation.en: Stay out of my string beans, bears,
translation.vi: Stay out of my string beans, bears,

translation.en: or be ready to face show-and-tell.
translation.vi: or be ready to face show-and-tell.

translation.en: Have you seen my Dottsy?
translation.vi: Have you seen my Dottsy?

translation.en: That's so weird. Nancy never cries.
translation.vi: That's so weird. Nancy never cries.

translation.en: …and kind and adorable little sister.
translation.vi: …and kind and adorable little sister.

translation.en: I found Bean!
translation.vi: I found Bean!

translation.en: Stop! I command you to leave Bean alone!
translation.vi: Stop! I command you to leave Bean alone!

translation.en: -[Nancy growling] -[Bean and Ivy scream]
translation.vi: -[Nancy growling] -[Bean and Ivy scream]

translation.en: ♪ No need to rush, we'll take it slowly ♪
translation.vi: ♪ No need to rush, we'll take it slowly ♪

translation.en: ♪ Guess, our worlds colliding ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Guess, our worlds colliding ♪

translation.en: -♪ I'll take my time trying ♪ -[snaps fingers]
translation.vi: -♪ I'll take my time trying ♪ -[snaps fingers]

translation.en: ♪ Memories through photographs… ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Memories through photographs… ♪

translation.en: ♪ That makes us laugh ♪
translation.vi: ♪ That makes us laugh ♪

translation.en: ♪ I think we do… ♪
translation.vi: ♪ I think we do… ♪

translation.en: -♪ Get along just right ♪ -[laughing]
translation.vi: -♪ Get along just right ♪ -[laughing]

translation.en: ♪ It's you ♪
translation.vi: ♪ It's you ♪

translation.en: -♪ It's you ♪ -[speaking indistinctly]
translation.vi: -♪ It's you ♪ -[speaking indistinctly]

translation.en: ♪ Spending all of our time Figuring what to do ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Spending all of our time Figuring what to do ♪

translation.en: ♪ Not too far There's a place just for us two ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Not too far There's a place just for us two ♪

translation.en: ♪ It's an endless world that's outside So I'm sticking with you ♪
translation.vi: ♪ It's an endless world that's outside So I'm sticking with you ♪

translation.en: ♪ Memories through photographs ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Memories through photographs ♪

translation.en: ♪ Somewhere we both go ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Somewhere we both go ♪

translation.en: ♪ I think we do get along just right ♪
translation.vi: ♪ I think we do get along just right ♪
